x-kubernetes-validations.message: PromotionTemplate step must have exactly one of uses or task set
PromotionTemplate step referencing a task cannot set continueOnError
PromotionTemplate step referencing a task cannot set retry

additionalProperties.description:
FreightReference is a simplified representation of a piece of Freight -- not
a root resource type.

charts.description: Charts describes specific versions of specific Helm charts.

items.description: Chart describes a specific version of a Helm chart.

name.description: Name specifies the name of the chart.

repoURL.description:
RepoURL specifies the URL of a Helm chart repository. Classic chart
repositories (using HTTP/S) can contain differently named charts. When this
field points to such a repository, the Name field will specify the name of
the chart within the repository. In the case of a repository within an OCI
registry, the URL implicitly points to a specific chart and the Name field
will be empty.

version.description: Version specifies a particular version of the chart.

commits.description: Commits describes specific Git repository commits.

items.description: GitCommit describes a specific commit from a specific Git repository.

author.description: Author is the author of the commit.

branch.description: Branch denotes the branch of the repository where this commit was found.

committer.description: Committer is the person who committed the commit.

id.description:
ID is the ID of a specific commit in the Git repository specified by
RepoURL.

message.description:
Message is the message associated with the commit. At present, this only
contains the first line (subject) of the commit message.

repoURL.description: RepoURL is the URL of a Git repository.

tag.description:
Tag denotes a tag in the repository that matched selection criteria and
resolved to this commit.

images.description: Images describes specific versions of specific container images.

items.description: Image describes a specific version of a container image.

annotations.description: Annotations is a map of arbitrary metadata for the image.

digest.description:
Digest identifies a specific version of the image in the repository
specified by RepoURL. This is a more precise identifier than Tag.

repoURL.description: RepoURL describes the repository in which the image can be found.

tag.description:
Tag identifies a specific version of the image in the repository specified
by RepoURL.

name.description:
Name is a system-assigned identifier derived deterministically from
the contents of the Freight. I.e., two pieces of Freight can be compared
for equality by comparing their Names.

origin.description: Origin describes a kind of Freight in terms of its origin.

kind.description:
Kind is the kind of resource from which Freight may have originated. At
present, this can only be "Warehouse".

name.description:
Name is the name of the resource of the kind indicated by the Kind field
from which Freight may originate.
